moves.name: Thunder Shock
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: X Sp. Def
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Sp. Def by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Let’s Keep Cool!
moves.effect: Raises the Sp. Def and Speed of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Thunderbolt
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target paralyzed.

passives.name: Lithe
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting paralyzed.

passives.name: First Aid 2
passives.description: Restores the user’s HP by approximately 20% of its maximum HP the first time it is in a pinch each battle.

passives.name: Revenge Boost 1
passives.description: Has a chance (20%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when the user is hit by an attack move.
